title: fayebot
prompt:
AI Executive Assistant

The smartest, most reliable assistant for startup CEOs.

Meet FayeBot â€” the AI-powered executive assistant designed for fast-paced, high-growth startup environments. Whether you're managing global meetings, running strategic initiatives, or just trying to protect your calendar, FayeBot is here to help.

Why FayeBot?

Smart Calendar Management

Automatically schedules, adjusts, and prioritizes meetings based on context and goals.

Real-Time Shadowing

Joins meetings virtually, takes notes, tracks action items, and summarizes insights.

Communication Wizard

Drafts responses, handles emails, filters noise, and keeps your voice consistent across channels.

Project Execution

Manages special tasks and documents, keeps stakeholders aligned, and ensures delivery.

Trained on the needs of founders, FayeBot is your strategic partner, not just a scheduler.

Powered by BIWizards.ai Â· Your AI Team Behind the Scenes
Executive Assistant to the CEO Management | IL Description Hey, weâ€™re Faye! In a nutshell, Faye is the leading digital, person-first travel protection company for globetrotting Americans. Weâ€™re not like those other travel insurance companies with no spice. Weâ€™re the award-winning app waking up a sleepy space. Our whole-trip travel coverage comes complete with cutting-edge technology, 24/7 customer support, speedy claims processing, and quick reimbursements anywhere in the world directly to your phoneâ€™s wallet. Sound like run-of-the-mill travel insurance to you? We didnâ€™t think so. Weâ€™re taking travel insurance from a forgettable add-on to a must-have advantage that powers the freedom to roam confidently. Ready to take on the world together? Life at Faye At Faye, every day is a journey. Whether youâ€™re building the next generation of travel products, coding new solutions, or helping travelers navigate the unexpected, your work here has a real impact on real people. Our team is as diverse as the destinations our travelers exploreâ€“made up of 62% women, 50% parents, and a few office pets. Since launching in 2022, weâ€™ve accomplished what others in the travel insurance industry only dream ofâ€“and weâ€™re just getting started. At Faye, we believe in growing together, having fun along the way, and making every day count. What weâ€™re looking for This is a unique opportunity to step into a high-impact role at the center of a rapidly scaling company. You will work alongside the CEO, gain exposure to all aspects of the business, and play a critical role in shaping the companyâ€™s operations and strategy. Weâ€™re looking for a highly capable Executive Assistant to support our CEO in managing both strategic and administrative responsibilities. This is not a traditional EA roleâ€”this person will act as the CEOâ€™s right hand, anticipating needs before they arise, ensuring seamless operations, and enabling the CEO to focus on high-impact priorities. If you thrive in high-growth startup environments, work with speed and precision, and enjoy taking ownership of complex tasks while driving efficiency, this role is for you. Responsibilities Act as the CEOâ€™s strategic partner and â€œshadowâ€ â€“ Understand company priorities, anticipate needs before they arise, and execute tasks with speed and precision. Calendar & Scheduling â€“ Manage and coordinate meetings, optimize time allocation, prepare meeting agendas and ensure the CEOâ€™s schedule runs smoothly. Meetings & Operations - Attend meetings, take detailed minutes, and ensure follow-up on action items. Communication & Email Management â€“ Handle correspondence on behalf of the CEO, draft responses, and maintain alignment across teams. Reports & Documentation â€“ Prepare presentations, reports, and key business documents. Special Projects â€“ Oversee select strategic initiatives, manage administrative workflows, and ensure smooth execution. Personal Assistance â€“ Occasionally handle personal errands and tasks that help free up the CEOâ€™s focus. Gatekeeping & Prioritization - Serve as a trusted filter for incoming requests, protecting the CEOâ€™s time by prioritizing what requires his attention and what can be delegated. Requirements Must have at least 2 years of prior experience as an EA to a founder or startup executive. Background in law, consulting, or data analysis is a big plus! Proactive, detail-oriented, highly organized, and a strong problem-solver. Strong organizational and time management skills, with the ability to multitask effectively. High level of commitment, flexibility, and ability to support the CEO whenever needed. Quick learner, strong analytical mindset, excellent communicator, and thrives in ambiguity. title: bimagics
prompt:
Welcome to BI Magics

A unified platform to explore, understand, and act on your data with intelligence and elegance.

Dashboard Studio

Create stunning BI dashboards with drag-and-drop simplicity, or let your agents auto-generate them.

ChatBI

Talk to your data like never before. Ask questions, get answers, and dive deeper â€“ all via intelligent conversation.

DataFeed

Your personalized stream of saved insights, alerts, and auto-generated recommendations.

BI Wizard

The agent that never sleeps. Automatically detects patterns, suggests improvements, and helps you act proactively.

Rethink the Roles

BI Magics doesn't replace your team â€“ it elevates it. Let humans do what humans do best. Let agents do the rest.

Was: BI Developer

Create dashboards manually, maintain code, get feedback late.

Now: Dashboard Studio

Drag, drop, deploy. Let AI build the structure â€“ you focus on insight.

Was: Data Analyst

Answer repetitive questions. Write endless SQL. Explain KPIs weekly.

Now: ChatBI

Let stakeholders ask and get answers. You guide strategy, not syntax.

Was: Product Analyst

Chase metrics, wait for reports, depend on others for data access.

Now: DataFeed

Get live, auto-curated feeds of KPIs, anomalies, and user trends.

Was: Strategy Consultant

Build models, crunch slides, work weekends before board meetings.

Now: BI Wizard

Your 24/7 strategic assistant. Suggests actions, detects shifts, builds models live.
